db:abstract.db:para: Provides a reader for XML Bookmark Exchange Language files.

db:article.db:programlisting:
HEADERS = mainwindow.h \ xbeltree.h SOURCES = main.cpp \ mainwindow.cpp \ xbeltree.cpp QT += xml widgets
EXAMPLE_FILES = frank.xbel jennifer.xbel
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/xml/dombookmarks INSTALLS += target
wince { addFiles.files = frank.xbel jennifer.xbel addFiles.path = "\\My Documents" INSTALLS += addFiles }
